evidence.claim: Pansy Homecare utilizes AWS services such as Lambda and S3 for their cloud infrastructure.
The company is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of health information.
References to RESTful APIs and FHIR in their documentation suggest they leverage modern integration patterns for EHR data.

icp.icp_reason: Pansy Homecare uses X12 for healthcare data transactions, aligning with our ICP.
